## Where I've lived. 

```{r PlacesLived}

library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(mapproj)
df <- read.csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Landcruiser87/Andy_Heroy_Data_Science/gh-pages/data/Livingspaces.csv')

colnames(df) <- c("Place","City","State","Lat","Long","Year","cnt")

US <- map_data("world") %>% filter(region=="USA")

ggplot() + 
  geom_polygon(data = US, aes(x=long, y = lat, group = group), fill="grey", alpha=0.3) + geom_point(data=df, aes(x=Long, y=Lat,size=cnt)) + coord_map() + ylim(20,50)+xlim(-130,-60)


```
